description: Second diagonal of triangle in A059370.
references: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 171, #34.
formula: G.f. A(x) is (R(x))^2 where R(x) is the series reversion of x*hypergeom([1,2],[],x) = sum(n>=1, n!*x^n), see Comtet. - _Mark van Hoeij_, Apr 20 2013
mathematica: nmax = 23; t[n_, k_] := t[n, k] = Sum[(m+1)!*t[n-m-1, k-1], {m, 0, n-k}]; t[n_, 1] = n!; t[n_, n_] = 1; tnk = Table[t[n, k], {n, 1, nmax}, {k, 1, nmax}]; A059370 = Reverse /@ Inverse[tnk] // DeleteCases[#, 0, 2] & ; Table[A059370[[n, n - 1]], {n, 2, nmax}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jun 14 2013 *)
prog: (PARI)N = 66;  x = 'x + O('x^N);tf = sum(n=1,N, n!*x^n );gf=serreverse(%)^2;v = Vec(gf)/* _Joerg Arndt_, Apr 20 2013 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 28 2001
extensions: Added more terms, _Mark van Hoeij_ and _Joerg Arndt_, Apr 20 2013
